questions.questionTitle: What problem does the woman have?
anwers: She is a victim of theft.
She has run out of money.

questions.questionTitle: What does the woman want to do?
What will the woman probably do next?
anwers: Give the man her account number
Thank the man and hang up
Hang up and look for her purse
Put the man on hold and call police

script:
� King Card customer service. How can I help you today?
� Yes, my purse has been stolen. I need to cancel my credit card and get a new one.
� I'm sorry to hear that. Hold on a second... OK, now, what is the name on the credit card? And what is the account number?
� It's Diana Shidler, S-H-I-D-L-E-R.
